name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial industries. Expertise in **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **React**, **Next.js**, **PostgreSQL**, **RESTful APIs**, **Docker**, **AWS**, and **CI/CD**. Proven track record of developing and maintaining scalable applications, with a strong focus on microservices and event-driven architectures.
Skilled in deploying AI/ML-powered platforms using frameworks and tools such as **OpenAI**, **LangChain**, and **Mastra AI** to enhance predictive analytics and automation. Proficient in utilizing tools like **Redis**, **RabbitMQ**, and **BullMQ** for efficient data processing and message queuing.
Familiar with modern state management libraries such as **Redux Toolkit**, **Zustand**, and techniques like **GraphQL** and **React Query**. Strong background in maintaining compliance with standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Adept in MLOps practices, leveraging **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for model orchestration.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained full-stack applications using **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **React** (17–18), and **Next.js**, integrating **RESTful APIs** and ensuring adherence to industry standards.
Designed and implemented advanced data infrastructure solutions with **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, optimizing for performance and scalability in health and fintech domains.
Led CI/CD initiatives focusing on automation through **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**, achieving efficient deployment workflows and minimizing release times by **30%**.
Transformed traditional applications into microservices using **Docker** and **AWS** services, enabling a seamless transition and improving system reliability by **40%**.
Executed data operations using **Redis** and **RabbitMQ** for efficient task management and real-time data processing, significantly enhancing application responsiveness.
Implemented modern state management techniques utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **React Query**, automated user interface updates, and improved user experience by **25%**.
Leveraged **GraphQL** for optimized data fetching, reducing the volume of required API calls and enhancing overall application performance.
Developed AI-driven features using **OpenAI** and **LangChain**, rapidly integrating intelligent functionalities into existing applications.
Designed interactive user dashboards using **Tailwind** and **shadcn/ui**, facilitating data visualization through tools such as **Chart.js**, improving usability and engagement.
Constructed resilient DevOps pipelines, incorporating **Fastify** for swift execution of backend tasks and ensuring comprehensive automated testing across all environments.
Collaborated with machine learning teams to leverage **LLM** and deploy models for enhanced data insights, establishing robust connections between frontend and backend systems.
Instrumented observability practices with **BullMQ** for queue management and efficient background processing, enhancing performance in high-load scenarios.

• Developed interactive front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Next.js**, **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, ensuring dynamic and responsive interfaces for financial tools and administrative panels.
• Enhanced backend capabilities by transitioning to a microservices architecture with **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, which improved scalability and performance for high-volume transactions by **30%**.
• Designed and implemented **RESTful APIs** and utilized **GraphQL** to optimize data retrieval, reducing API response times by **25%**.
• Created real-time dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing valuable insights into financial transactions and anomalies, leading to a **40%** decrease in operational response time.
• Deployed a robust event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to handle asynchronous communication across critical workflows, improving payment processing efficiency by **35%**.
• Managed and developed ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for seamless ingestion of financial data from internal and third-party sources, supporting both batch and real-time processing.
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, resulting in a **50%** increase in proactive detection of suspicious activities based on user behavior patterns.
• Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services and enhance decision-making processes.

- Developed and maintained robust **RESTful APIs** using **Node.js** (NestJS, Fastify) and **TypeScript**, ensuring high performance and scalability by handling up to **10,000** concurrent requests.
- Engineered dynamic web applications with **React** (18) and **Next.js**, enhanced with **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS**, achieving a **25%** improvement in load time and user engagement across platforms.
- Implemented real-time features leveraging **WebSockets**, enabling instant updates and notifications for order tracking, improving customer satisfaction metrics by **15%**.
- Managed databases using **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, optimizing queries to handle over **1,000,000** records efficiently, ensuring data integrity and retrieval speed for a high-traffic environment.
- Designed and executed CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Docker** and **AWS**, reducing deployment time by **40%** while streamlining application updates and monitoring.
- Utilized AI technologies, particularly **OpenAI** and **LangChain**, to integrate innovative solutions that enhance user experience, automate customer interactions, and personalize shopping journeys.
- Employed **Redis** and **RabbitMQ** for efficient data caching and message brokering, achieving a **30%** reduction in data access latency and improving application responsiveness.
- Led the implementation of secure payment integrations with **Stripe** and **PayPal**, ensuring compliance with PCI standards and safeguarding sensitive transactional data.
- Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, promoting user data protection and GDPR compliance throughout the platform.
- Spearheaded feature flags and blue-green deployment strategies with **Docker** and **CI/CD** tools, facilitating smooth release processes and A/B testing opportunities.
